full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 200 of 236 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 Q. But there is no way for the videos or the photographs we saw to show that they were there any day prior to October 20th, 2005; isn't that right? 2 A. I just don't know how to answer that. 3 Q. Okay. 4 A. That's one of the best questions I've had in 55 years. If I do find out, I'll let you know. 5 Q. Then I'll ask a few more hopefully smart questions. 6 The same thing with the artwork that we saw in the videos and the photographs. The videos and the photographs show what artwork was in that house on October 20th of 2005; yes? 7 A. True. 8 Q. But it would have no way of showing what artwork was there on any day prior to October 20th, 2005? 9 A. I don't see how that would be possible. 10 Q. I'll just ask also about the items in the house apart from the artwork and the photographs, same question. There is no way that the video or the photographs could show what items were in the house prior to that day 11 A. No, sir, I don't believe science has gotten that far. 12 Q. So bottom line is, we have no idea from what we looked at in your testimony what the house looked like prior to October 20th of 2005? 13 A. I certainly don't. 14 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018301

So bottom line is, we have no idea from what we looked at in your testimony what the house looked like prior to October 20th of 2005? 13 A. I certainly don't.
